metadata.name: Alba Botanica UN petroleum Cherry SPF18 Lip Balm 1 5 mg 1g Stick

clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Indicated as an active UV B filter to prevent photodamage

contraindications.disease: Padimate O causes DNA strand breaks of cells under the epidermis _in vitro_ A32458 No LD50 value reported
contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Padimate O absorbs UV B rays which can in turn induce DNA damage in human keratinocytes While treatment of padimate O suppresses the formation of UV endonuclease sensitive sites there is also an increase in direct strand breaks of DNA in cells A32458 L2151
